title: Bug 4974: Setting classpath and output location should be one operation
OB: When I press Ok after setting the output location, I receive the following error message: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. It seems that setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations. By setting the output location first, an illegal state is created.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the settings menu. 
2. Select the 'Output Location' option. 
3. Set the output location to a nested folder within the source folder. 
4. Press Ok and observe the error message.
